title: The Wi-Fi signal cannot be detected of B593s-931
answer:
1. Check whether the power adapter is correctly connected. 

 2. Ensure that the device is placed in an open environment so that the device can get better signal. 

 3. Keep the device away from household electrical appliances which produce strong electric or magnetic fields, such as micro-wave ovens, refrigerators, or disc satellite antennas. 

 4. Make sure your you didn’t enable Hide SSID broadcast option in Wi-Fi Settings 

                 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32662) 

 5. Take your device a little close to the CPE and then try again to detect the Wi-Fi signal. 

 6. If still can’t detect the the Wi-Fi signal, you can restart your CPE and try again.
